3.1.1.name: wordpress/event-calendar
3.1.1.description:
Manage future events as an online calendar. Display upcoming events in a dynamic calendar, on a listings page, or as a list in the sidebar. You can subscribe to the calendar from iCal (OSX) or Sunbird.

Choose one WordPress category as the 'event' category, and then add posts for dates in the future. Add the calendar or event list functions to your template, or just use the 'Event Category' page to list your forthcoming events.

EventCalendar works fine with WordPress v2. It should also work with WordPress v1.5. Reports of successes and failures are most welcome.

Full Documentation
